item.title: Linux常见问题解决方法
item.author: mr_believe@outlook.com (Mr.Be1ieVe)
item.description: E: Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock-frontend - open (11: Resource temporarily unavailable) E: Unable to acquire the dpkg frontend lock (/var/lib/dpkg/lock-frontend), is another process using it? ps -A | grep apt sudo kill -9 processnumber sudo rm /var/lib/dpkg/lock sudo rm /var/lib/dpkg/lock-frontend E: Could not get lock /var/cache/apt/archives/lock - open (11: Resource temporarily unavailable) E: Unable to lock directory /var/cache/apt/archives/ sudo killall apt-get sudo rm /var/lib/apt/lists/lock sudo rm /var/cache/apt/archives/lock sudo rm

item.title: Proxychains
item.author: mr_believe@outlook.com (Mr.Be1ieVe)
item.description: 折腾两小时，不如问一下人= = Proxychains 先安装 然后sudo vi /etc/proxychains.conf socks5 win_ip 1080 win_ip为你的windows主机ip，可在cmd ifconfig查看 飞机要打开
